subtask.title: Identify Beginner-Friendly Learning Resources
subtask.objective: Gather accessible articles, videos, tutorials, and interactive platforms aligned with the core AI areas.
subtask.scope: Focus on practical, introductory materials suitable for self-paced learning.

verification.completion_summary: The collected findings include numerous beginner-friendly resources such as tutorials, videos, and articles focused on AI fundamentals, SDK usage, career transition guidance, and practical AI development. The scope of practical, introductory materials for self-paced learning appears to be addressed through various accessible resources.

covered_aspects: accessible articles, videos, tutorials, interactive platforms
missing_aspects: explicit mention of interactive platforms or hands-on workshops
comprehensive coverage of all core AI areas in a structured manner
clearly curated beginner pathways or curricula

missing_requirements: A curated, structured collection of beginner-friendly, self-paced learning resources aligned with core AI topics
Explicitly identified interactive or hands-on platforms for beginners
